hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: Something of her was stolen, and she began to curse him (i.e. the thief). The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to her: Do not lessen his sin

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ دَعَا عَلَى مَنْ ظَلَمَ
chapter.eng-name: One who prays against the one who wrongs him
